fields.name: Swiss Water Decaf
fields.description: Experience the rich and satisfying taste of our Decaf Delight, a premium decaffeinated coffee crafted for those who love the flavour of coffee but prefer to avoid caffeine. Our decaf coffee offers a perfect balance of smoothness and depth, ensuring that you can enjoy your favourite beverage any time of day without the jitters or sleepless nights.

fields.name: Sunrise Serenade
fields.description: Discover the perfect harmony of flavors with our Sunrise Serenade Blend, an exquisite coffee blend designed to delight your senses. Crafted from a meticulous selection of the finest Arabica beans sourced from renowned coffee-growing regions, this blend offers a balanced and rich coffee experience that will elevate your daily ritual.

fields.name: Java Joyride
fields.description: Take your taste buds on an exhilarating journey with Java Joyride, a single origin designed for those who seek bold flavours and unforgettable experiences. Crafted from the highest quality Arabica beans sourced from the lush landscapes of Central and South America, Java Joyride delivers a vibrant and robust coffee experience that will energize your day.

fields.name: Happy Camper
fields.description: Fuel your outdoor adventures with Happy Camper, a coffee blend crafted for those who embrace the joy of the great outdoors. Whether you're waking up to the crisp morning air at a campsite or reminiscing about your last hiking trip from the comfort of home, Happy Camper delivers a smooth and invigorating coffee experience that’s as delightful as the great outdoors.

fields.name: Perky Panther
fields.description: Awaken your senses with Perky Panther, a single-origin coffee that embodies the strength, grace, and vitality of its namesake. Sourced from the lush highlands of Colombia, this coffee is meticulously cultivated to deliver an unparalleled flavor experience. Perky Panther is perfect for coffee connoisseurs who appreciate the distinct nuances of single-origin brews.

fields.name: Rocket Fuel
fields.description: Ignite your mornings with Rocket Fuel, a single-origin coffee that delivers an explosive burst of flavor and energy. Sourced from the high-altitude regions of Ethiopia, this coffee is carefully cultivated and expertly roasted to bring you a cup of coffee that’s as bold and invigorating as a rocket launch. Rocket Fuel is the perfect choice for those who crave a strong, dynamic coffee experience to kickstart their day.

fields.name: Brew-tiful Day
fields.description: Embrace the promise of a beautiful day with Brew-tiful Day Blend, a coffee designed to bring joy and warmth to your mornings. Carefully crafted from a selection of premium Arabica beans sourced from Central and South America, this blend offers a harmonious and delightful coffee experience that’s sure to put a smile on your face.

fields.name: Aeropress Filter Papers
fields.description: Ensure every cup of coffee you brew with your AeroPress is smooth, flavorful, and free from unwanted sediments with our high-quality AeroPress Filter Paper. Specifically designed for use with the AeroPress coffee maker, these filters help you achieve the perfect cup every time by providing superior filtration and maintaining the purity of your brew.

fields.name: V60 Filter Papers
fields.description: Ensure every cup of coffee you brew with your V60 is smooth, flavourful, and free from unwanted sediments with our high-quality V60 Filter Paper. Specifically designed for use with the V60 coffee maker, these filters help you achieve the perfect cup every time by providing superior filtration and maintaining the purity of your brew.

fields.name: Aeropress Metal Reusable Filter
fields.description: Upgrade your coffee brewing experience with our Metal Aeropress Reusable Filter. Designed for the discerning coffee enthusiast, this filter offers an eco-friendly and cost-effective alternative to paper filters, enhancing the flavour profile of your favourite coffee beans.

fields.name: V60 Plastic Dripper
fields.description: Discover the art of pour-over coffee brewing with the V60 Coffee Dripper. Renowned for its exceptional design and brewing precision, the V60 enables you to craft a perfect cup of coffee, bringing out the nuanced flavours and aromas of your favourite beans.

fields.name: V60 Glass Dripper
fields.description: Discover the art of pour-over coffee brewing with the V60 Coffee Dripper. Renowned for its exceptional design and brewing precision, the V60 enables you to craft a perfect cup of coffee, bringing out the nuanced flavours and aromas of your favourite beans.

fields.name: Aeropress
fields.description: Experience the perfect blend of convenience and quality with the AeroPress Coffee and Espresso Maker. Designed for coffee enthusiasts who crave a rich, smooth brew, this innovative device combines the best features of various brewing methods to deliver a superior coffee experience in just minutes.

fields.name: Manual Grinder
fields.description: Experience the perfect grind every time with our Premium Manual Coffee Grinder. Designed for coffee enthusiasts who appreciate the art of a finely ground bean, this hand-crank grinder ensures precision and consistency, bringing out the full flavour and aroma of your favourite coffee.

fields.name: Electric Espresso Grinder
fields.description: Unlock the full potential of your espresso with our Elite Electric Espresso Grinder. Designed for serious coffee aficionados and baristas, this grinder ensures precision and consistency for the perfect espresso shot. Its powerful motor and advanced features make it an indispensable tool for any coffee lover.

fields.name: Caramel Coffee Syrup
fields.description: Indulge in the rich, buttery flavour of our Gourmet Caramel Coffee Syrup. Crafted to elevate your coffee experience, this luxurious syrup blends seamlessly into hot or cold beverages, adding a touch of sweetness and a depth of flavour that is simply irresistible.

fields.name: Vanilla Coffee Syrup
fields.description: Indulge in the rich, buttery flavour of our Gourmet Vanilla Coffee Syrup. Crafted to elevate your coffee experience, this luxurious syrup blends seamlessly into hot or cold beverages, adding a touch of sweetness and a depth of flavour that is simply irresistible.

fields.name: Chocolate Coffee Syrup
fields.description: Indulge in the rich, buttery flavour of our Gourmet Chocolate Coffee Syrup. Crafted to elevate your coffee experience, this luxurious syrup blends seamlessly into hot or cold beverages, adding a touch of sweetness and a depth of flavour that is simply irresistible.

fields.name: Grinder, Mug and Coffee Gift Set
fields.description: Gift the joy of fresh, flavourful coffee with our Premium Manual Coffee Grinder, a must-have for any coffee aficionado. This elegantly designed grinder is not just a tool but a delightful experience, transforming each coffee-making session into a ritual of precision and pleasure. And coupled with a bag of freshly roasted coffee beans, this makes the perfect gift for any occasion.

fields.name: Single Origin Coffee Bean Gift Set
fields.description: Experience the exquisite flavours of all four of our Single Origin Coffee Bean roasts, the perfect gift for a coffee fanatic. Our coffee is celebrated for its vibrant profile and exceptional quality, delivering a delightful cup every time.

fields.name: Blend Coffee Bean Gift Set
fields.description: Experience the exquisite flavours of all four of our Blend Coffee Bean roasts, the perfect gift for a coffee fanatic. Our coffee is celebrated for its vibrant profile and exceptional quality, delivering a delightful cup every time.

fields.name: V60 Starter Kit
fields.description: Delight the coffee enthusiast in your life with our V60 Pour-Over Coffee Maker Starter Set, complete with a glass V60, novelty mug and coffee grounds - a perfect blend of elegance and functionality. This complete set provides everything needed to craft the perfect cup of coffee, making it an ideal gift for both beginners and experienced coffee lovers.

fields.name: Aeropress Starter Kit
fields.description: Delight the coffee enthusiast in your life with our Aeropress Pour-Over Coffee Maker Starter Set, complete with an Aeropress, novelty mug and coffee grounds - a perfect blend of elegance and functionality. This complete set provides everything needed to craft the perfect cup of coffee, making it an ideal gift for both beginners and experienced coffee lovers.
